meanings.definition: A device that emits a beeping sound, typically used to alert someone of a message or call.
meanings.sent1: The beeper on my phone woke me up this morning.
meanings.sent2: I heard the beeper go off when a new message arrived.
meanings.sent3: The beeper on the microwave always makes me jump!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a beeper in the quiet room.
meanings.sent5: The beeper's shrill sound pierced through the silence.

meanings.definition: A person who beeps or makes beeping sounds.
meanings.sent1: The little boy imitated a beeper with his mouth.
meanings.sent2: The beeper in the play made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent3: She joked that her friend was a walking beeper.
meanings.sent4: His voice was a beeper in the choir, always standing out.
meanings.sent5: The beeper's cheerful chirp brightened the room.

meanings.sent1: The machine will beeper when it finishes.
meanings.sent2: I accidentally made the toy beeper by pressing a button.
meanings.sent3: The birds outside seem to beeper in harmony.
meanings.sent4: Her heart beepered with excitement as she waited.
meanings.sent5: The alarm clock beepered loudly, waking everyone up.
